txt.en: Locate Hlóthi and inform him of your progress.
Talk to Hlóthi

'Hail!

'The Gabil'akkâ, the Unified Army of Dwarves, has need of your assistance in securing a foothold outside of Gundabad.

'There are several places where we could use your assistance in Elderslade.

'Might you assist us on the battlefield?'


<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: In order to advance this quest, you must complete any four of the required quests.</rgb>
'While there is more to do to assist the war effort, your help has been noted, and we greatly appreciate it.\n\n'Thank you kindly.'

Hlóthi has requested your aid in completing several tasks outside of Gundabad for the Gabil'akkâ, the Unified Army of Dwarves.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: In order to advance this quest, you must complete any four of the required quests.</rgb>
